languages.text: "Эти твари будут скрестись в стенки твоего сознания каждый раз, как корабль окажется за вуалью. Если ты вновь дашь им повод... помни о цене ошибки".
"Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."
languages.original_text: "Эти твари будут скрестись в стенки твоего сознания каждый раз, как корабль окажется за вуалью. Если ты вновь дашь им повод... помни о цене ошибки".

traits.locale_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “每当飞船冒险越过面纱时，这些事情就会不断搔挠你的心灵之壁。如果你再让它们趁虚而入……仔细想想，这个失误会让你付出多大的代价。”
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: “每当飞船冒险越过面纱时，这些事情就会不断搔挠你的心灵之壁。如果你再让它们趁虚而入……仔细想想，这个失误会让你付出多大的代价。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Ces choses tenteront de pénétrer dans votre esprit chaque fois que le vaisseau s'aventurera de l'autre côté du voile. Si vous les laissez de nouveau entrer... Une telle erreur pourrait nous coûter très cher. »
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: « Ces choses tenteront de pénétrer dans votre esprit chaque fois que le vaisseau s'aventurera de l'autre côté du voile. Si vous les laissez de nouveau entrer... Une telle erreur pourrait nous coûter très cher. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Esas cosas van a arañar las paredes de tu mente cada vez que la nave atraviese el velo. Si vuelves a darles motivos... piensa en el precio de semejante error».
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: «Esas cosas van a arañar las paredes de tu mente cada vez que la nave atraviese el velo. Si vuelves a darles motivos... piensa en el precio de semejante error».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「危険を冒してシップがヴェールを超えるたび、こうしたことがあなたの心の壁に傷を残す。また起きれば…過ちの代償を考えることだ」
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: 「危険を冒してシップがヴェールを超えるたび、こうしたことがあなたの心の壁に傷を残す。また起きれば…過ちの代償を考えることだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Diese Dinger werden an den Wänden Eures Verstands kratzen, wann immer das Schiff hinter den Schleier reist. Wenn Ihr ihnen erneut einen Grund gebt ... überlegt, wie kostspielig dieser Fehler sein könnte."
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Dinger werden an den Wänden Eures Verstands kratzen, wann immer das Schiff hinter den Schleier reist. Wenn Ihr ihnen erneut einen Grund gebt ... überlegt, wie kostspielig dieser Fehler sein könnte."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."

languages.text: "O şeyler, gemi öbür dünyaya her geçtiğinde zihninin duvarlarını tırmalayacak. Onlara yeni bir amaç verirsen ne büyük bir hata yapmış olacağını bir düşün."
languages.original_text: "Those things will be scratching at the walls of your mind every time the ship ventures beyond the veil. If you give them cause again... think of how costly a mistake could be."
